name: email-onebox
description: Feature-rich email onebox with AI categorization and real-time sync

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run docker:up && npm run install:all
scripts.start: npm run docker:up && npm run dev
scripts.clean: npm run docker:clean && rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules
